img.alt: A = triangle truss, B = square truss

choicegroup.label: Which of the structures shown below will be able to resist the highest load?

div.p: The triangular structure will be able to resist a higher load. Triangular structures tend to be very stiff, meaning the deflections are very low, and strong, meaning they are able to resist a high load. A four bar structure with pinned connections will collapse under very little load.
